data.title: Taylor Swift‚Äôs Track ‚ÄúFlorida!!!‚Äù *Might* Be About This Former Celebrity Couple
data.meta_description: This is the meaning behind Taylor Swift‚Äôs ‚ÄòFlorida!!!‚Äô and all the rumors surrounding the people who inspired it.
data.text:
In the event you've been living under a literal rock, Taylor Swift‚Äôs latest studio album, The Tortured Poets Department, is officially here...meaning it‚Äôs time for Swifties everywhere (guilty) to be in their feels and obsess over every single lyric for the next month and a half at least.

Now, in the event you didn‚Äôt get the memo from our official Tortured Poets Department Chairman‚Ñ¢Ô∏è, the project is the musician‚Äôs 11th studio album. And though it was initially thought to have 16 tracks and four bonus numbers, Tay wound up blessing us with an additional 15 (!!!!!) songs at 2 a.m. the night she debuted the album‚Äîa welcome surprise fans thought might happen given...

Anyway! Today, we‚Äôre here to talk about one of our absolute fave songs ‚ÄúFlorida!!!‚Äù‚Äîwhich, btw, has a *chef‚Äôs kiss* assist from the iconic Florence Welch. While the tribute to the state might seem kinda ??? (or !!!, for that matter) given the singer was raised in Pennsylvania, her exes Joe Alwyn and Matty Healy are from the UK, and her current boyfriend Travis Kelce hails from Ohio, it kinda sorta makes sense if you think about it. Let us explain...

One theory is that the track alludes to Taylor‚Äôs relationship with Joe, given the singer‚Äôs first Eras Tour stop following the news of their split was Tampa, Florida, from April 13 to 15, 2023. She played three nights in the city before moving on to *drumroll, pls* Houston from April 21 to 23. Now, the reason this tidbit is so ü§Ø is that one of the lyrics in ‚ÄúFlorida!!!‚Äù reads, ‚ÄúSo you pack your life away just to wait out the shitstorm back in Texas.‚Äù

But because Swifties are true masterminds (heh), this is far from the only postulation about the song. Case in point? Some have theorized that it‚Äôs about Sophie Turner and Joe Jonas‚Äôs split since the fellow musician filed for divorce from the actor in Florida back in September 2023.

Amid her legal battle with Joe, Sophie and her daughters reportedly began living in Tay‚Äôs Tribeca home, per Page Six. The two also went out to dinner a buncha times and even attended a Kansas City Chiefs vs. New York Jets game in October 2023. Oh, *and* it was reported that one of Tay‚Äôs close friends‚ÄîBrittany Mahomes‚Äîwanted ‚Äúto set [Sophie] up‚Äù with one of Travis‚Äôs friends. ‚ÄúBrittany knows Sophie is newly single and has hung [out] with her before when Sophie attended one of the [Kansas City Chiefs] games. She would love to help play matchmaker,‚Äù a source dished to Us Weekly back in November.

^ A moment for this iconic squad pic, pls!

Btw, to make matters more ü•∫ re: Tay and Sophie‚Äôs friendship, at the start of this year, the actor posted a touching tribute to her besties on Instagram alongside the caption, ‚Äú2023 was the year of the girlies. 2024s forecast is looking fairly consistent.‚Äù And, yes, Tay makes the cut (along with Ms. Sabrina Carpenter!). Ahem:

Now, if you‚Äôre not someone who loves to dwell on the potential lore of Taylor‚Äôs song lyrics (can‚Äôt relate) and prefer something a bit more concrete/less scandalous, here‚Äôs what ‚ÄúFlorida!!!‚Äù is about according to the celeb herself c/o an iHeart Radio intro she took part in:

‚Äú‚ÄòFlorida!!!‚Äô is a song that I wrote with Florence and the Machine, and I think I was coming up with this idea of like, What happens when your life doesn‚Äôt fit or your choices you‚Äôve made catch up to you and you‚Äôre surrounded by these harsh consequences and judgment, and circumstances did not lead you to where you want to be and you just want to escape from everything you‚Äôve ever known. Is there a place you could go?

‚ÄúI‚Äôm always watching like Dateline‚Äîpeople, you know, have these crimes that they commit. Where do they immediately skip town and go to? They go to Florida, you know? They like try to reinvent themselves, have a new identity, blend in. And I think when you go through a heartbreak, there‚Äôs a part of you that thinks, I want a new name, I want a new life, I don‚Äôt want anyone to know where I‚Äôve been or know me at all. And so that was the jumping-off point behind, Where would you go to reinvent yourself and blend in? Florida.‚Äù

Florence herself also opened up about the songwriting process with Tay, who apparently came up with ‚Äúa concept and a story‚Äù for the track‚Äî‚Äúmy favorite way to start songwriting,‚Äù she noted during her convo with . ‚ÄúI almost didn‚Äôt think of the scale of it,‚Äù the singer said of ‚ÄúFlorida!!!‚Äù before adding, ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs the sort of bigness of [Taylor Swift the phenomenon], and then there‚Äôs the Taylor I spend time with in the studio, who is just the sweetest and most down to earth.‚Äù

‚ÄúWe had such a fun time,‚Äù Florence recalled of making the hit alongside Tay. ‚ÄúAnd then when it came out I was like, ‚ÄòOh, sh*t!'‚Äù Truly obsessed with how we're not the only ones constantly in awe of Tay. üòÇ

Without further ado, let‚Äôs dive into ‚ÄúFlorida!!!‚Äù and see what its lyrics are really about.

[Verse 1: Taylor Swift]

You can beat the heat if you beat the charges too

They said I was a cheat, I guess it must be true

And my friends all smell like weed or little babies

And this city reeks of driving myself crazy

[Pre-Chorus: Taylor Swift]

Little did you know your home‚Äôs really only

A town you‚Äôre just a guest in

So you work your life away just to pay

For a time-share down in Destin

[Chorus: Taylor Swift & Florence Welch, Taylor Swift]

Florida

Is one hell of a drug

Florida

Can I use you up?

[Verse 2: Florence Welch]

The hurricane with my name when it came

I got drunk and I dared it to wash me away

Barricaded in the bathroom with a bottle of wine

Well, me and my ghosts, w–µ had a hell of a time

Yes, I‚Äôm haunt–µd, but I‚Äôm feeling just fine

All my girls got their lace and their crimes

And your cheating husband disappeared

Well, no one asks any questions here

[Verse 3: Florence Welch, Taylor Swift & Florence Welch]

So I did my best to lay to rest

All of the bodies that have ever been on my body

And in my mind, they sink into the swamp

Is that a bad thing to say in a song?

[Pre-Chorus: Florence Welch]

Little did you know your home‚Äôs really only

The town you‚Äôll get arrested

So you pack your life away just to wait out

The shitstorm back in Texas

[Chorus: Taylor Swift & Florence Welch, Taylor Swift]

Florida

Is one hell of a drug

Florida

Can I use you up?

[Bridge: Taylor Swift, Florence Welch, Taylor Swift & Florence Welch]

I need to forget, so take me to Florida

I‚Äôve got some regrets, I‚Äôll bury them in Florida

Tell me I‚Äôm despicable, say it‚Äôs unforgivable

At least the dolls are beautiful, fuck me up, Florida

I need to forget, so take me to Florida

I‚Äôve got some regrets, I‚Äôll bury them in Florida

Tell me I‚Äôm despicable, say it‚Äôs unforgivable

What a crash, what a rush, fuck me up, Florida

It‚Äôs one hell of a drug

It‚Äôs one hell of a drug

Love loves me like this and I want to resist

So take me to Florida
